summary: Cluster machine creation blocked, action required
description: Action Required: Your cluster is unable to create a machine with type '${INVALID_MACHINE_TYPE}' due to ${REASON}. Please ${REMEDIATION} in order to restore your cluster to full functionality. For more information on supported machine types, refer to: https://docs.redhat.com/dedicated/osd_architecture/osd_policy/osd-service-definition.html#gcp-compute-types_osd-service-definition.
